item.title: Arduino-Phone
item.description: What is this… ard-wino-fone? We are going to build a small three-LED arduino communication device, known as the Arduino-Phone. The device will be able to send 3 different signals to it’s counterpart, and shall also be able to receive these signals back. The device is operated using simple buttons and will display the reception or transmission using its LEDs. The Arduino-Phone definitely does not fall into the category of revolutionairy technology, but still is a pretty cool device.
